alert.note: Alert for Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 10:56AM CDT until August 22 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Texas, including the following counties, Kaufman and Van Zandt. * WHEN...Until 500 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is ongoing or imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - The heaviest rainfall has moved out of the area, but flooding will continue as scattered showers persist. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dallas, Mesquite, Ennis, Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Canton, Wills Point, Sunnyvale, Grand Saline, Mabank, Crandall, Van, Combine, Talty, Seven Points, Edgewood, Kemp and Fruitvale.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
